DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether synthetic hernia mesh materials undergo physical and/or chemical changes while in the body.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Age â‰¥ 18 yrs Previous placement of hernia mesh material Current need for excision of previous mesh placement or Current need for intraabdominal surgical procedure Exclusion criteria: Age < 18 yrs No retained mesh prosthetic. Non surgical candidate Prisoner
